text: "Behind the Cow" is a song by German band Scooter featuring American rapper Fatman Scoop. Premiered at The Dome 40 in Düsseldorf on 1 December 2006, it was released on 19 January 2007 as the lead single from Scooter's twelfth studio album The Ultimate Aural Orgasm. (Live at Trancentral)" and "America: What Time Is Love?", "(Don't Fear) The Reaper" by Blue Öyster Cult and "Black Celebration" by Depeche Mode.
